title.rendered: 6 Criteria For Testing Products On Amazon

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 19:21 — 17.7MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 19:21 — 17.7MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

How do you know whether a new product is a good idea on Amazon? In this week’s Tip Of The Week video we discuss five decision making criteria you can use to evaluate a product on Amazon.
